title: The true loves knot untied. Being the right path, whereby to advise princely virgins how to behave themselves, by the example of the renowned princess, the Lady Arabella, and the second son to the Lord Seymore, Late Earl of Hertford. The the tune of, Frogs Galliards..
notes: Right half of sheet contains "The second part to the same tune."
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
